{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Agent",
  "description": "Beebeejump International Limited is a leading solar power company in Nigeria. It is headquartered at 75b, Ogunnusi Isheri Road, Ojodu Berger, Lagos, with a sales and after-sales team of more than 200 in its headquarter alone. Beebeejump prides itself as a leading solar power company in Nigeria, a high-tech enterprise specializing in solar energy technology research, product development, production and sales. It is a solar product manufacturer and intelligent technology leader in the solar industry, and it is an Expert in distributed off-grid photo-voltaic system solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Agent

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Communicate with customers via phone, email, and chat
	Provide knowledgeable answers to questions about the product, pricing, and availability
	Work with internal departments to meet customer&#39;s needs
	Data entry in various platforms
	Keep records of customer interactions and transactions
	Record details of inquiries, comments, and complaints
	Record details of actions taken
	Follow up on customer interactions
	Provide feedback on the efficiency of the customer service process.


Qualifications


	Minimum OND, HND, BSc in any related course
	At least 1 year of relevant work experience
	Excellent phone etiquette and excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work
	Knowledge of customer service principles and practices
	Knowledge of relevant computer applications
	Knowledge of social media platforms
	Knowledge of administrative procedures
	Numeric, oral, and written language applications
	Must live within Ogba, Ojodu, Ketu,Ojota, Ketu, Agege, and Ikeja environs.


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 / month.

Benefits of Working with Beebeejump


	A great place to learn, and get trained
	Amazing and talented teammates to work with
	Structured work environment
	As a customer service agent you get to earn more incentives, outside your monthly pay.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to:&nbsp;hr@beebeejump.com&nbsp;using &quot;Customer Service Agent&quot; as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

  },

  },

Customer Service Agent Job at Beebeejump International Limited




        
    

        
        Beebeejump International Limited is a leading solar power company in Nigeria. It is headquartered at 75b, Ogunnusi Isheri Road, Ojodu Berger, Lagos, with a sales and after-sales team of more than 200 in its headquarter alone. Beebeejump prides itself as a leading solar power company in Nigeria, a high-tech enterprise specializing in solar energy technology research, product development, production and sales. It is a solar product manufacturer and intelligent technology leader in the solar industry, and it is an Expert in distributed off-grid photo-voltaic system solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Agent
     

            
    



Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Communicate with customers via phone, email, and chat
	Provide knowledgeable answers to questions about the product, pricing, and availability
	Work with internal departments to meet customer's needs
	Data entry in various platforms
	Keep records of customer interactions and transactions
	Record details of inquiries, comments, and complaints
	Record details of actions taken
	Follow up on customer interactions
	Provide feedback on the efficiency of the customer service process.


Qualifications


	Minimum OND, HND, BSc in any related course
	At least 1 year of relevant work experience
	Excellent phone etiquette and excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work
	Knowledge of customer service principles and practices
	Knowledge of relevant computer applications
	Knowledge of social media platforms
	Knowledge of administrative procedures
	Numeric, oral, and written language applications
	Must live within Ogba, Ojodu, Ketu,Ojota, Ketu, Agege, and Ikeja environs.


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 / month.

Benefits of Working with Beebeejump


	A great place to learn, and get trained
	Amazing and talented teammates to work with
	Structured work environment
	As a customer service agent you get to earn more incentives, outside your monthly pay.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to: hr@beebeejump.com using "Customer Service Agent" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Demand Generation Manager",
  "description": "TNL Pharmaceutical Company is one of the leading pharmaceutical companies in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Demand Generation Manager

Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT) &amp; Igando - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Develop and execute demand generation and marketing campaigns.
	Collaborate with sales teams to increase product uptake.
	Conduct market research and analyze campaign performance.
	Ensure all marketing activities comply with regulatory standards.
	Manage budgets, monitor results, and report performance to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Pharmacy, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred).
	2 - 4 years of relevant experience in pharmaceuticals
	Strong marketing and analytical skills.
	Good understanding of pharmaceutical markets.
	Excellent communication, planning, and team coordination skills.
	Creativity and ability to deliver measurable results.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;tnlrecruitment01@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-27",

  },

Demand Generation Manager Job at TNL Pharmaceutical Company




        
    

        
        TNL Pharmaceutical Company is one of the leading pharmaceutical companies in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Demand Generation Manager

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) & Igando - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and execute demand generation and marketing campaigns.
	Collaborate with sales teams to increase product uptake.
	Conduct market research and analyze campaign performance.
	Ensure all marketing activities comply with regulatory standards.
	Manage budgets, monitor results, and report performance to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Pharmacy, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred).
	2 - 4 years of relevant experience in pharmaceuticals
	Strong marketing and analytical skills.
	Good understanding of pharmaceutical markets.
	Excellent communication, planning, and team coordination skills.
	Creativity and ability to deliver measurable results.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and Cover Letter to: tnlrecruitment01@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
